projects.title: Portfolio Rebuild
projects.tagline: Rebuilt my portfolio using React-js and hosting on Github pages
projects.desc_1: When I had time I had intented to move away from wordpress and rebuild my portfolio from the ground up
projects.desc_2: I choose to use React as this is a langauge I have enjoyed from my limited experience in, I wanted to get more experience so I thought this would be a good place to start.
